amendment.description: To provide additional construction funding for levee improvements in the New Orleans metropolitan area, gulf coast restoration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3769 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3769 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S3772-3776; text: CR S3772-3773) To provide additional construction funding for levee improvements in the New Orleans metropolitan area, gulf coast restoration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3769 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3769 proposed by Senator Domenici.
